column3: Traffic Alert for N Cleveland Rd:
column4: Access to N Cleveland Rd from Winchester Rd (toward I-64) is shut down due to an asphalt truck on its side near I-64.
All inbound lanes are shut down due to a collision involving a semi in a ditch.
Inbound traffic is being diverted to Nandino Blvd toward Georgetown Rd.
Tates Creek Rd near Providence Rd
column5: A single vehicle reportedly struck a tree.

column4: Outbound Georgetown Rd at Nandino Blvd
column5: Two separate collisions reported.  One lane is blocked.  Significant traffic impact in this area.

column4: Iron Works Pike between Russell Cave Rd and Newtown Pike
column5: A dump truck is blocking one lane.
